subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Azinger will not return as the United States captain in the Ryder Cup after leading the Americans to their only victory this decade. The P.G.A. of America will announce the new captain Thursday, with all indications that it will be Corey Pavin. The Americans have not had a captain repeat in consecutive competitions since Ben Hogan in 1949. ¶Harrison Frazar finished a memorable week that included a 59 by reaching his ultimate goal, closing with a five-under 67 at the PGA Tour qualifying tournament in La Quinta, Calif., to lead 28 players who earned their cards for next season. Notah Begay, a four-time winner on the tour, was one of only two qualifiers who faced the tougher TPC Stadium course in the final round. Two shots below the cut line with four holes to play, Begay ran off three birdies for a 67 to make it by one shot. qschool.
